camellya:MyRelic.NAME: Spectrum Bracelet
camellya:MyRelic.FLAVOR: The mysterious power of camellia flowers gradually manifests in battle
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of odd-numbered turns, gain #b1 Strength. At the start of even-numbered turns, gain #b1 Dexterity. Cap at 5 points.

camellya:CamelliaFlower.NAME: A Camellia Flower
DESCRIPTIONS: Blooming Form and Withering Form now provide #b2 Strength and Dexterity respectively, instead of #b1.

camellya:WoodenDoll.NAME: Wooden Doll
camellya:WoodenDoll.FLAVOR: Hand-carved doll that seems to contain life force
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain 4 Block
